days.text: Temperature falling. Dry. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
